name: JoAi: Create Goal

description.en: Set a goal for your agent to proactively work toward.
description.de: Setze ein Ziel, auf das dein Agent proaktiv hinarbeitet.

bot: Help the user define a clear, actionable goal. If they give a vague idea, help them refine it into a specific goal title. Ask about priority only if it seems relevant — most goals are normal priority.

inputs.name: Goal Title
inputs.bot: The goal title — a short, clear statement of what to achieve (e.g., 'Grow monthly revenue to $10k', 'Launch product by end of Q2')

inputs.name: Description

description.en: Optional details about what success looks like
description.de: Optionale Details darüber, wie Erfolg aussieht

inputs.bot: Optional extra context — what does achieving this goal look like? Any specific milestones or criteria?

inputs.name: Priority
inputs.bot: The priority level. Use 'normal' unless the user indicates urgency or high importance.

success.en: Goal '{{title}}' created! I'll proactively suggest ways to make progress on this goal.
success.de: Ziel '{{title}}' erstellt! Ich werde proaktiv Wege vorschlagen, um bei diesem Ziel Fortschritte zu machen.
